This is the system documentation for the &DJL;. Documentation on DACS - the Distributed Access Control System - may be found at the DACS home page. The DACS distribution itself is available for download from SourceForge:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/dacs.
This document is a beginning but readers should be aware that there are gaps in the coverage and that documentation lags behind code.
This first version of &DJL; implements Java wrapper classes for selected DACS services, and provides an HTTP client through which DACS services may be accessed and DACS credentials obtained and managed. The &DJL; is open source software and has been released as a companion project to DACS on SourceForge:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/dacs-contrib
Note that the &DJL; adds no new functionality to DACS.
